original_text: He built it as the Lord's servant, Moses, had told the Israelites to do. Moses had written this on the scroll of God's laws. The law said, ‘You must build an altar with whole stones that you have not cut. Do not use any iron tools on them.’ They made burnt offerings on the altar to worship the Lord. They also made sacrifices as friendship offerings.
korean_text: 이는 여호와의 종 모세가 이스라엘 자손에게 명령한 것과 모세의 율법책에 기록된 대로 쇠 연장으로 다듬지 아니한 새 돌로 만든 제단이라 무리가 여호와께 번제물과 화목제물을 그 위에 드렸으며

sentences.original_text: He built it as the Lord's servant
Moses, had told the Israelites to do
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 이스라엘 백성에게 하라고 말했던 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Moses had written this on the scroll of God's laws
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 이것을 하나님의 법 두루마리에 기록했습니다

sentences.original_text: You must build an altar with whole stones
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 온전한 돌로 제단을 지어야 한다

sentences.original_text: Do not use any iron tools on them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들 위에 철 도구를 사용하지 말라

sentences.original_text: They made burnt offerings on the altar
They also made sacrifices as friendship offerings
